Chapter on oscillations

Oscillation is a regular variation in magnitude or position about a central point.

Pendulum

Pendulum often refers to a weight hung from a fixed point so that it can swing freely under the influence of forces.

Open the scribbles on pendulum

Optics

Optics is the scientific study of sight and the behaviour of light, or the properties of transmission and deflection of other forms of radiation.

Open the scribbles on optics

Optics

Acoustics is the branch of physics concerned with the properties of sound.
